name: Lost Game
description:
A small, top down game made in 10 days as part of the NotMoe Game Jam #1.

The jam theme was "Lost", and the original concept for this game began with the player character being 'lost in their own thoughts', needing to fight off negative thoughts and find their way out and back into the real world.

We didn't quite get there with the aesthetic or enemies, but we did enjoy experimenting with some simple random level generation!

Please enjoy!

Source code is also fully available here!
